name: BitBucketPullRequest
description: Creates a pull request for two branches.
helpMarkDown: Creates a pull request on [BitBucket](https://bitbucket.org) for two branches.
author: Gio Palacino

inputs.name: BitBucketUsername
inputs.label: BitBucket Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username of the BitBucket repository authorized user.

inputs.name: BitBucketPassword
inputs.label: BitBucket Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the username of the BitBucket repository authorized user.

inputs.name: RepositoryOwner
inputs.label: Repository Owner
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username of the BitBucket repository owner.

inputs.name: RepositoryName
inputs.label: Repository Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the repository hosted in BitBucket.

inputs.name: SourceBranchName
inputs.label: Source Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the branch to be merged into the target branch.

inputs.name: TargetBranchName
inputs.label: Target Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the branch into which the souce branch will be merged.

inputs.name: PullRequestTitle
inputs.label: Pull Request Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: The title of the pull request to be created.

inputs.name: ReviewerNames
inputs.label: Reviewers
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma separated list of reviewer usernames.

inputs.name: IsCloseSourceBranchEnabled
inputs.label: Close Source Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this to have the source branch closed after it is merged to the target branch.

inputs.name: IsShowRawResponseEnabled
inputs.label: Show Raw Response
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this to have the raw HTTP response from BitBucket written to the output.

messages.NoUsername: No BitBucket username was provided for the pull request.
messages.NoRepoName: No repository name was provided for the pull request.
messages.NoSourceBranch: No source branch was provided for the pull request.
messages.NoTargetBranch: No target branch was provided for the pull request.
messages.NoPullRequestTitle: No title was provided for the pull request..
